name: Automated Bug Hunter
gather: Scan codebase for potential bugs, security vulnerabilities, and code smells. Check error logs and user-reported issues.
execute: Write test cases for discovered issues. Fix bugs and submit patches. Update test coverage.
evaluate: Verify bug fixes pass all tests. Track bug fix rate and test coverage improvement.
kpi: Bugs fixed >= 5/week, test coverage > 90%, zero regressions
